verbose_text: Rivaroxaban and apixaban inhibited the chromogenic activity of free factor Xa in a concentration dependent manner (XREF_FIG) with K i values of 2.6 +/- 0.4 nM and 2.0 +/- 0.1 nM, respectively, values comparable with those previously reported.
evidence: apixaban inhibited the chromogenic activity of free factor Xa
